member.name: E:Mexc.Net.Clients.SpotApi.MexcRestClientSpotApi.OnOrderPlaced
member.summary: Event triggered when an order is placed via this client. Only available for Spot orders

member.name: E:Mexc.Net.Clients.SpotApi.MexcRestClientSpotApi.OnOrderCanceled
member.summary: Event triggered when an order is canceled via this client. Note that this does not trigger when using CancelAllOrdersAsync. Only available for Spot orders

member.name: F:Mexc.Net.Enums.TimeInForce.GoodTillCanceled
member.summary: GoodTillCanceled orders will stay active until they are filled or canceled

member.name: F:Mexc.Net.Enums.TimeInForce.ImmediateOrCancel
member.summary: ImmediateOrCancel orders have to be at least partially filled upon placing or will be automatically canceled

member.name: F:Mexc.Net.Enums.TimeInForce.FillOrKill
member.summary: FillOrKill orders have to be entirely filled upon placing or will be automatically canceled

member.name: F:Mexc.Net.Enums.TimeInForce.GoodTillExpiredOrCanceled
member.summary: Good til the order expires or is canceled

member.param: Service provider for resolving logging and clients

member.name: T:Mexc.Net.SymbolOrderBooks.MexcSpotSymbolOrderBook
member.summary: Implementation for a synchronized order book. After calling Start the order book will sync itself and keep up to date with new data. It will automatically try to reconnect and resync in case of a lost/interrupted connection. Make sure to check the State property to see if the order book is synced.

member.summary: Create a new order book instance
